DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine diagnostic management concordance face-to-face dermatologist versus store-and-forward teledermatologist skin cancer screen event . The investigator ' hypothesis include follow : 1 . Compared in-person assessment , store-and-forward teledermatology assessment result adequate diagnostic concordance . 2 . Compared in-person assessment , store-and-forward teledermatology result adequate management concordance . 3 . The sensitivity specificity store-and-forward evaluation detect lesion either premalignant malignant similar in-person evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Store-and-Forward Teledermatology Versus Face-to-Face Assessment During Skin Cancer Screening Event
